snippet.title: Fake News GGC 2020 | Trailer
snippet.description:
Control a member of the television crew and craft your director’s tales with props and cutouts to make the most credible News Stories!
 
Fake News is a couch co-op game about running a 'credible' news studio. In this experience, players control a member of the television crew in a news channel studio. The studio is filled with various props and cardboard cutouts so that they can rapidly craft the director's tales to get views.


Play it now for free on itchio! 

https://channel6team.itch.io/fake-news
